title: [Mangagamer] Cho Dengeki Striker
description:
Yamato has a great sense of justice and aspires to be a hero. He always tried to protect his childhood friend Haruna when sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s being bullied, but he always got beat down instead. One day, Haruna was going to move away and wanted to say goodbye to him. However, he despaired that he was never able to protect her once in the end.

He met an old man called the Ã¢â‚¬ËœMemory CollectorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, who could grant any wish in exchange for oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s memories. Yamato wished to become a Stryker, the hero from a manga he loved.
